refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The EtherLAB Codegeneration compiles a Scicos Superblock to an standalone Executeable. It integrates the MSR Protocol. The Executeable is prepared to run as normal userspace process under high priority to minimize the calling jitter. Under a Linux Kernel with RT-Preempt Patch there are process cycles up to 50 kHz possible (depends on CPU, additional Hardware, IO-Infrastructure). The Codegeneration is based on the RTAILAB Codegeneration. Thanks to Roberto Bucher for his great work.
